title: Use of smart phone - unique in Chinese society

content.question: Task 4: Cultural Presentation You will be asked to speak in Chinese on a specific topic. Imagine you are making an oral presentation to your Chinese class. First, you will read the topic of your presentation. You will have 4 minutes to prepare your presentation. Then you will have 2 minutes to record your presentation. Your presentation should be as complete as possible. Topic of presentation: Choose ONE use of the smart phone that is unique in the Chinese society (such as communicating via WeChat, sending red pockets [hongbao], sending Lunar New Year wishes via phone, etc.). In your presentation, describe this use of the smart phone and explain its significance.
